plot: Maggie, the cook, pretends to be ill so she doesn't have to make breakfast for the Jones family. When Mr. Jones tries to light the stove to make his own breakfast, it explodes.
title: Building a Fire
plot_es: Maggie, the cook, pretends to be ill so she doesn't have to make breakfast for the Jones family. When Mr. Jones tries to light the stove to make his own breakfast, it explodes.
plot_en: Maggie, the cook, pretends to be ill so she doesn't have to make breakfast for the Jones family. When Mr. Jones tries to light the stove to make his own breakfast, it explodes.
